# Metamagic, Maximize
## Overview
**Aura** strong (no school); **CL** 17th

**Slot** none

**Price** 54,000 gp

**Weight** 5 lbs.

**Description**

The wielder can cast up to three spells (from 1st to 6th level) per day that are maximized as though using the [[Maximize Spell (Feat)|Maximize Spell]] feat.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Rod (Feat)|Craft Rod]], [[Maximize Spell (Feat)|Maximize Spell]] feat

**Cost** 27,000 gp

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 485
